ygData.subject: Ogre faction and training near freeport?
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi all, I just got a friend into EQ (Is it just me or does anyone else seem to picture that Truth tobacco commercial ads with body bags whenever you introduce
ygData.messageBody:
Hi all,

I just got a friend into EQ (Is it just me or does anyone else seem to
picture that Truth tobacco commercial ads with body bags whenever you
introduce a new victu...er, player to EQ? >:-) ). She's decided to start
an Ogre warrioress with green hair (She liked the green hair for some reason),
and I brought her all the way to freeport.

Since i've never played an evil factioned race before, i have no idea where
she should go to train her skills. We found she can get into Neriak to buy/sell
and bank, but the warriors guild there won't train her. We also tried that
barbarian warrior under east freeport.

Does any know where she can train near Neriak or freeport? Or does she have
to travel all the way back to Ogguk? Also any tips on what she can do to help
her faction so she can get into the freeport city would be appreciated!


Thanks,
-Sceadu
Lvl 6 (Human) Shadow Knight
Tunare
